title: Remove Akali's stun from her ultimate.
body: Like who the fuck thought this was a good idea? Hard CC in an execute dash ability? Huh?

>So being able to make a bush in the middle of the river isn't "breaking the rules of the game" now?

Nope, his bushes work the same as every other bush.

>Being able to prevent people from dashing wasn't "breaking the rules of the game" back when Cass was the only one with that type of cc, was it not?

>Extending cc duration...doesn't seem like anyone else in the game does that, either, does it? It's just Ornn. I guess he's "breaking the rules of the game" now.

>Oh wait, Bard can aoe stasis people. "But only Zhonya's can stasis people." Broke the rules. Remove Bard.

Nope, Zhonya's is a known effect.

Akali breaks the towers rule. You go under a tower? You get ** _REVEALED_** (as in **_TARGETABLE_**) and shot regardless of ye olde Stealth or new fangled Camouflage or Invisibility. Akali gets to choose if she gets shot or not. Her "unique strength" could and _should have_, imo, been her E being able to follow anywhere on the map.

The comparison of Grounded to Akali's mechanic doesn't work. Akali's shroud breaks the player's expectation of "under tower = revealed and shot". That is why it breaks the "rule". There was no expectation to Grounded. It was either you can move, or you cannot move with previous CC. (And even then I think Grounded is a ridiculous CC since it stops Flash.)

Trip over myself? What? I don't know what or where you're talking about, but I don't believe I did. At all.

I actually thought about Lee Q specifically typing that, and I decided to leave it out as it is much harder to pull off as you have to essentially activate it before the marked target leaves his range, whereas Akali E can follow them no matter what as long as the duration doesn't expire.

She gets bonus minion damage at max rank. They could give her rank scaling bonus minion damage instead to make her waveclear not shit. Late game she can practically Q a whole wave and clear it. That's a lot better than Katarina considering Kat's damage is delayed and ADCs generally mop the floor with your wave before you even have a chance to clear them. Here's a comparison of Akali with just gunblade(no runes or anything) of the damage of her abilities at max rank:

Passive: 272
Q: 191
E: 416(both activations) or 196(just hitting the E but not reactivating)
R:260(first activation)/264(second activation)/524(both activations)

Q doesn't look like much in this sense, but if you think about it Akali's gonna Q you most likely 2 times in the same few seconds. That's gonna put her Q at 382 which is more than her passive(assuming she doesn't use her passive on you both times, which she could, but there could be situations blocking her from doing that, meaning she could proc more damage than her passive by just using her Q in shroud).

To be fair though after looking at it, E could probably use more of a nerf than Q, but then again Akali doesn't max E because she needs the waveclear so probably not. It does do an awfully high amount of damage rank 1 as well though.
